ftbquests.chapter.create.title: Create[--机械动力--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.descrip: The &bMillstone&r is one of the first methods to automatically crush items.[--&b岩浆&r是第一个自动粉碎物品的方法之一.--]
It can automate all &6Hammer&r recipes, as well as many others.[--它可以自动化所有&6锤子&r配方和许多其他配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.descrip: &bMechanical Crafters&r can autocraft recipes, including some that are larger than 3x3.[--&b动力合成器&r可以自动合成,包括一些大于3x3的配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.title: Motors[--电机--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.descrip: &bMotors&r uses FE to generate rotational energy. Higher tier motors generate more SU and consume higher amounts of FE.[--&bMotors&r使用FE产生旋转能量。更高等级的马达产生更多的SU并消耗更高的FE.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.descrip: &bDeployers&r will &6use the item given&r on the block in front of it.[--&b发电机&r会&6在它前面的方块上使用给定的物品&r.--]
It can either left or right-click, and target blocks, items, or entities.[--它可以左键或右键单击,并瞄准方块、物品或实体。--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests4.subtitl: Make a Mechanical Arm[--制作动力臂--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests4.descrip: &bMechanical Arms&r can move items with much more precision than Mechanical Belts.[--&b动力臂&r可以比动力腰带更精准地移动物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests5.subtitl: Make a Mechanical Saw[--做个动力锯--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests5.descrip: Either when used alone, or when part of a contraption, the &bMechanical Saw&r will &6cut down trees in front of it&r.[--无论是单次使用,还是设备的一部分,&b动力锯&r都会&6砍倒它前面的树&r.--]
An upward facing Saw can be used to &6process certain items&r.[--向上锯可用于&6处理某些物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests6.subtitl: Make a Mechanical Harvester[--制作动力收割机--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests6.descrip: When used as part of a contraption, the &bMechanical Harvester&r will harvest and replant crops it passes through.[--当&b动力收割机&r作为装置的一部分使用时,它会收获并补种它穿过的作物.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests7.descrip: The &bSpout&r will &6fill items below it with fluid&r, if they are in a Depot or Belt.[--&b泵&r将&6用流体填充它下方的物品&r,如果它们位于置物台或传送带中的话.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests8.descrip: Some mixing recipes need to be &6heated&r. This is done using a &bBlaze Burner&r.[--一些混合配方需要&6加热&r.这是使用&b烈焰人燃烧室&r完成的.--]
The Blaze Burner &6accepts furnace fuel&r to become heated.[--烈焰人燃烧室&6接受熔炉燃料&r来加热.--]
To become &6over-heated&r, you will have to feed it &6Blaze Cakes&r![--要变成&6过热&r,你必须喂它&6烈焰蛋糕&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests9.descrip: The &bChute&r works much like a Hopper, but will drop item entities instead.[--&b溜槽&r的工作方式类似于漏斗,但会掉落物品实体.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests10.subtit: Make a Smart Chute[--做个智能溜槽--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests10.descri: The &bSmart Chute&r functions the same, but can be &6filtered&r.[--&b智能溜槽&r功能相同,但可以&6过滤&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests11.subtit: Make a Brass Ingot[--做个黄铜锭--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests11.descri: &bBrass&r is a flexible alloy, and is the basis for many of &eCreate&r's more advanced machines.[--&b黄铜&r是一种软化合金,是许多&eCreate&r的更高级机器的基础.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests12.subtit: Make a Portable Storage Interface[--制作便携存储接口--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests12.descri: Inventories on contraptions cannot be accessed manually. Instead, you have to use a pair of &bPortable Storage Interfaces&r![--无法手动访问装置上的库存。相反,你必须使用一对&b便携式存储接口&r!--]

Place one on the contraption, and another that is not. Whenever the two line up (aka, when the contraption moves close), the contraption will pause to allow items to pass through.[--在装置上放置一个,另一个则不是。当两条线向上(aka,当装置向上移动时),装置将暂停,允许物品通过.--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests13.subtit: Make a Brass Funnel[--制作黄铜漏斗--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests13.descri: The &bBrass Funnel&r works like the Andesite version, but &6can be filtered&r![--&b黄铜漏斗&r像安山岩一样工作,但&6可以过滤&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests14.descri: The &bMechanical Bearing&r is the foundation of most Create &6contraptions&r, which are basically freeform moving multiblocks.[--&b动力轴承&r是大多数&6动力消耗&r的基础,它们基本上是自由移动多方块结构.--]

When rotational force is applied, it will &6rotate the connected contraption&r. This enables certain blocks, like &6Harvesters&r, &6Cutters&r, and &6Deployers&r to work![--当使用旋转力时,它会&6旋转连接的装置&r.这可以让某些方块工作,例如&6收割器&r、&6切割机&r和&6发电机&r!--]
You can attach more blocks using &6Glue&r, and use &6Chassis&r to make the contraption larger. Make sure to &6check the Ponders&r![--你可以使用&6胶水&r连接更多的方块,然后使用&6混凝土&r来使装置更大。确保&6检查草方块&r!--]
